item.description:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor(
lvl = 100.0 = Math.pow(2.0, lvl / 7.0));
output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp)
return lvl;
